sqls.sql: SELECT DISTINCT "商品管理番号" AS value, "商品管理番号" AS text FROM "MST_出品マスタ情報" WHERE "length" ( 商品管理番号 ) > 0 AND "店舗ID" = :shopid ORDER BY "商品管理番号"
SELECT "商品区分" as type ,"商品管理番号" as productno ,"分類１" as sub1 ,"分類２" as sub2 ,"LABEL番号" as label ,"備考" as remark ,"店舗名" as shopname ,"店舗ID" as shopid FROM "MST_LABEL情報" WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid
SELECT * FROM `mst_label情報` mst WHERE mst.`LABEL番号` = :label AND mst.`店舗ID` = :shopid AND mst.`商品区分` = '代納商品'

SELECT *
FROM `mst_label情報` mst WHERE mst.`店舗ID` = :shopid AND mst.`商品区分` = '自納商品'
SELECT DISTINCT sub1 FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN "分類１" IS NULL THEN '‐‐‐‐' ELSE "分類１" END AS sub1 FROM "MST_出品マスタ情報" WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid and "商品管理番号" = :product and "親子区分" = '子商品' ) TEMP ORDER BY sub1

SELECT DISTINCT sub2 FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN "分類２" IS NULL THEN '‐‐‐‐' ELSE "分類２" END AS sub2 FROM "MST_出品マスタ情報" WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid and "商品管理番号" = :product and "親子区分" = '子商品' AND ( "分類１" = :sub1 ) AND ( "分類１" is null ) ) TEMP ORDER BY sub2

SELECT "商品名称" AS productname FROM "MST_出品マスタ情報" WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid and "商品管理番号" = :product and "親子区分" = '子商品' AND ( "分類１" = :sub1 )
AND ( "分類１" is null )
AND ( "分類２" = :sub2 )
AND ( "分類２" is null )

SELECT "商品管理番号" as productno, "分類１" as sub1, "分類２" as sub2, "店舗ID" as shopname, "LABEL番号" AS label
FROM "MST_出品マスタ情報" WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid and "商品管理番号" = :productno and "親子区分" = '子商品' AND ( "分類１" = :sub1 )
AND ( "分類１" is null )
AND ( "分類２" = :sub2 )
AND ( "分類２" is null )

INSERT INTO "MST_LABEL情報" ( "商品区分", "商品管理番号", "分類１", "分類２", "LABEL番号", "備考", "店舗名", "店舗ID", "登録日時", "更新日時" )VALUES ( '代納商品', :productno, :sub1, :sub2, :label, :remark, :shopname, :shopid, now(), now() )

delete from "MST_LABEL情報" where "店舗ID"= !shopid and "商品区分"= '代納商品' and "商品管理番号"= !productno AND ("分類１" = !sub1 ) AND ( "分類１" is null ) AND ( "分類２" = !sub2 ) AND ( "分類２" is null ) and "LABEL番号"= !label

insert into `mst_label情報`
values ( :type, :productno, :sub1, :sub2, :label, :count, :shopname, :shopid, now(), now() )
